Reviews.Title: Nice Cam
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: I waited for a good lil while before I got this cam, I have taken it to Jamaica and Cayman islands, I have been impressed by the photos tajen

Reviews.Title: Easy to use
Reviews.Author: SLT
Reviews.Content: I'm not a beginner but wanted an inexpensive camera that allows me to use some camera skills without a bunch of lenses. It was recommended by a friend that is a naturalist photographer. Meets my needs.

Reviews.Title: Great package deal.
Reviews.Author: L. W. "Lori W"
Reviews.Content: It was a great package deal but I wasn't impressed with the picture quality or the way the zoom worked.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Erin06
Reviews.Content: Comes with everything.  Best package I ever purchased.  Still trying to figure out all of the options for the camera!!

Reviews.Title: Got sent the wrong camera
Reviews.Author: Julio Alvarez
Reviews.Content: I orders fujifilm finepix s4300 and got a s4500 it's all good cause it's a better camera but still I wanted what I ordered

ProductInfo.Features:
14-megapixel CCD sensor; 26x wide-angle optical zoom lens
Motion Panorama shooting mode 720p HD movie capture; mini-HDMI output
Easy upload to Facebook and YouTube
Capture images and video to SD/SDHC memory cards
14 million effective pixels; 1/2.3 inch CCD sensor; 30x optical zoom lens plus approx 6.7x digital zoom
ProductInfo.Name: Fujifilm FinePix S4300 14 MP Digital Camera with Fujinon 26x Super Wide Angle Optical Zoom Lens and 3-Inch LCD Accessory Saver 8GB NiMH Battery/Rapid Charger Bundle BLACK
